tool_description: Detailed technical specs for a wide range of helicopter models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/helicopter.
name: Helicopter by API-Ninjas
title: Helicopter by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/helicopter
api_list.description:
API Ninjas Helicopter API endpoint. Returns a list of helicopter specs that match the given parameters.

At least one of the following parameters (excluding the limit parameter) must be set.

optional_parameters.name: max_height
optional_parameters.description: Maximum height of the helicopter in feet.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: min_height
optional_parameters.description: Minimum height of the helicopter in feet.

optional_parameters.name: max_length
optional_parameters.description: Maximum length of the helicopter in feet.

optional_parameters.name: min_length
optional_parameters.description: Minimum length of the helicopter in feet.

optional_parameters.name: min_speed
optional_parameters.description: Minimum max. air speed in knots.

optional_parameters.name: min_range
optional_parameters.description: Minimum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

optional_parameters.name: max_range
optional_parameters.description: Maximum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

optional_parameters.name: max_speed
optional_parameters.description: Maximum max. air speed in knots.

optional_parameters.name: manufacturer
optional_parameters.description: Company that designed and built the helicopter.
